channel.title: Adding shop issue help pls!
channel.description:
[size=36pt][b]Fixed the problem but now i have a new one i don't see my new made shop [/b][/siz
I'm a beginner RSPS (coder) i have a issue when i add a new shop in my game.
here are some pics
First i added some code in actionhandler.java what you can see here 1#[img]http://snag.gy/unQpN.jpg[/img]
then i made a new shop 2#[img]http://snag.gy/mLUp2.jpg[/img]
then i added code for spawing the npc 3#[img]http://snag.gy/F1OUz.jpg[/img]
the compiler 4#[img]http://snag.gy/SR42A.jpg[/img]
the server 5#[img]http://snag.gy/tIreO.jpg[/img]
the client with error 6#[img]http://snag.gy/N683o.jpg[/img]
i don't see my new made shop
can someone help me pls
THX Yun
